= jekyll =
== Install ==
*   sudo apt-get install ruby1.9.1
*   sudo apt-get install rubygems
*   sudo apt-get install libyaml-ruby
*   gem install jekyll --no-rdoc --no-ri

== Structure ==
*   _config.yml: stores configuration data
*   _drafts: drafts are unpublished posts, files without data
*   _includes: the partials that can be mixed and matched by your layouts and posts to facilitate reuse
*   _layouts: the templates that wrap posts, in YAML front matter
*   _posts: dynamic content, must be formated by YMD-title.markup
*   _site: the generated site
*   index.html: root directory
